content: this is a simple twisted crochet ear warmer headband pattern that is suitable for beginners learn how to make these cozy yet stylish ear warmers that are perfect for keeping your ears warm this winter this is an easy and fun beginner crochet project and if you re an experienced crocheter you ll be able to work up a couple of crochet headbands in no time see more details and pattern on my blog https //mycrochetspace com/simple-crochet-ear-warmer-headband-free-pattern/
